description.lang: The Door/Window Detector is a Z-Wave enabled device and is fully compatible with any Z-Wave enabled network. Z-Wave enabled devices displaying the Z-Wave logo can also be used with it regardless of the manufacturer, and ours can also be used in other manufacturers Z-Wave enabled networks.Inclusion of this Door/Window Detector on other manufacturers Wireless Controller menu allows remote turn-on of connected modules and their connected lighting when the Detector is triggered.
